name: CatchN'Shade® Beach Buddy
description:
Made of rust resistant aluminum and powder coated. This product is not like the wimpy plastic models. The beach buddy is designed to auger into soft to medium sand and at the waters’ edge, as a powerful base for your Market/Big Boy umbrella, simply insert it into your beach buddy and tighten the knobs.

We use materials such as “star board” marine grade polymer, rust resistant powder coated aluminum, and “sunbrella” fabric for their quality and durability.

Umbrella not included. All items sold separately 


Weight: 6lbs
Shipping Size: 26x26x6

name: CatchN'Shade® Tailgate Buddy
description:
Made of rust resistant aluminum and powder coated. The truck buddy is one of our most popular products if only for it’s ease of use. Simply put the Truck buddy on your 2” ball hitch receiver, and attach pin at the bottom of the tube. Then insert your market umbrella into the sturdy base, and adjust to your desired height. Once you’re done it’s time to work or play without worrying that your umbrella will fly away.

Operation of motor vehicle without dissembling these products could result in severe bodily injury or death. Please remove all products before operating your motor vehicles. 

Weight: 9lbs
Shipping Size: 12x12x48

name: CatchN'Shade® Tailgate Table
description:
Made out of “star board” marine grade polymer. The tailgate table for your truck will make it more convenient to cook and eat at your favorite sporting events and concerts.

We know that you’ll enjoy the quality of these products and the lightweight, yet durable design of our products for many years to come. Fits most full size tailgates. Also fits over handle for tailgate steps on Fords. H5 W24 L52

Weight: 45lbs

name: CatchN'Shade® Umbrella Carrier/Cover
description:
Made of “sunbrella” fabric. Market Umbrella cover makes it easy to carry large umbrellas to the beach. Comes with a carrying handle and a shoulder strap.

We know that you’ll enjoy the quality of these products and the lightweight, yet durable design of our products for many years to come. Your family and friends will all appreciate the escape from the heat at the ballpark or the beach. Be the savior of the party and help your and your loved ones catch some shade.

Weight: 3lbs 
Shipping Size: 16x12x4

name: CatchN'Shade® 360 Umbrella Table
description:
Made out of “star board” marine grade polymer. 22 inches round, comes in 4 or 6 cup holder models. Our tables make it convenient to cook or hold your favorite beverage.

You'll enjoy it's ease of use and the convenience of keeping your drinks out of the sand.

Weight: 9lbs 
Shipping Size: 26x26x6
